data.title: Latest news, views, pictures, video
data.meta_description: Elizabeth Hurley first hit the headlines at the Four Weddings and A Funeral premiere in 1994 wearing That Dress - a black Versace gown held together with safety pins. Then Hugh Grant's girlfriend, Liz later had a son with Steve Bing, a four year marriage to Arun Nayar and an on-off engagement to Shane Warne.
data.text:
Four Weddings and a Funeral 30 years on: How a low budget movie won over critics

Elizabeth Hurley first hit the headlines at the Four Weddings and A Funeral premiere in 1994 wearing That Dress - a black Versace gown held together with safety pins. Then Hugh Grant's girlfriend, Liz later had a son with Steve Bing, a four year marriage to Arun Nayar and an on-off engagement to Shane Warne.
